function RIR_EP04_02()
    --  .序章-2【11月第1週】「自害せよリア充」
    SaveData.Title = "自害せよリア充"

    -- //CG：LINE風画面（メッセージ入力欄に長文）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI115a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Serious
 "Alright. I'm sending it... I'm sending it...!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Sad
 "Ah, no, it's impossible. Hey, Akira. Can you read this message I'm sending him and tell me if it’s gross?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：ゲームしながら通話するアキラとリラ(リコ)・継続 116
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI116a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I took a screenshot on my phone and sent it to my friend Akira, who was on a call with me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0914.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Huh? No thanks, honestly?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0915.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why do I have to give advice on someone else’s love life when I can’t even handle my own properly?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira said that coldly after looking at the message I was revising to send to Minato-kun. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0624.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Bitter Smile
 "No no. You know, giving love advice can actually be fun sometimes. You like that stuff too, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0916.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I don’t have any experience talking about love with friends, so I have no clue. I guess it’s normal for normies." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0917.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So amazing—makes me jealous." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0625.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Bitter Smile, Sweat
 "You’re twisted more than usual... What’s up? Did something happen?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0918.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Just leave me alone. I’m just realizing my first love won’t come true." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0626.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Sad
 "Ugh... s-sorry. That really sucks..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The person I was talking to now, Akira, met me through an online game about two years ago. ]])

    MSG([[ We started off because she got toxic during a match and I sent her a warning message. ]])

    MSG([[ Since then, we’ve been paired up several times, teamed up to crush trolls, and begrudgingly teamed for events. ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, we’d gotten close. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira is a popular game streamer known for her sharp tongue, but she also has a surprisingly pure side, having been pining for her cousin she lives with. ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder what happened to her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0627.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Smile
 "If you want to vent, I’ll listen. Let’s talk while we play like usual." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0919.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...Okay, please. I’m feeling like a Friday the 13th today... Want to be a killer." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0628.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Bitter Smile, Sweat
 "For anyone who doesn’t know the game stuff, that sounds like something a psychopath would say... Alright then, let’s start." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I launched the game Akira wanted to play and resumed revising the message I’d send Minato-kun. ]])

    MSG([[ Since the Shirahiyosai Festival, where I felt the gap between Erica and myself, I hadn’t been able to send Minato-kun a LINE. ]])

    MSG([[ Shame about wasting time on romance and loss of confidence. Those were new feelings I was overwhelmed by, unable to move forward. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0629.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Sad
 "Ah... What should I do? Maybe I should just start the conversation... but if I send such a long message, even he, the oblivious one, will figure out I like him." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0630.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Sad
 "I can’t. I’m about to die from overthinking. Hey, Akira, what do you think? Is this long message gross?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0920.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You’re just turning into a love advice shop for yourself…! Just go off and die, you normie!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’ve got no chance at all, y’know..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0922.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "At the festival we went to together, I figured he likes someone else… Oh well." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0631.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Flustered
 "S-sorry! What kind of trauma event is that? That must really cut deep..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I never expected Akira to also be hurt at the festival. ]])

    MSG([[ Isn’t the festival supposed to be where romance blossoms? Well, I guess that’s how it goes for non-normies. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Advice from someone crushed by unrequited love: Don’t expect the other person to make a move... You gotta attack to win." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0924.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Rikopin is close with his beloved’s cousin, right? If you can’t talk to him directly, why not try asking her first?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0632.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Surprised
 "Akira... th-thanks." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That was a blind spot. If I consult Erica, I can casually approach her as myself wearing makeup. ]])

    MSG([[ I feel guilty ending up on the receiving end of advice after all. ]])

    MSG([[ Despite complaints and sarcasm, Akira always gives me advice. She’s twisted, but at heart, she’s kind. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0925.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well then, the normie’s normie problems are over, right? Now it’s my rant time. You’re sticking with me until late night." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIK01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0633.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】No Makeup, Bitter Smile
 "Hey hey. I’ll stick with you as long as you want." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：ゲームしながら通話するアキラとリラ(リコ)・終了  116
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ I erased the half-written message, tossed my phone onto the bed, and grabbed the game controller instead. ]])

    MSG([[ As usual, I started the online game while chatting with Akira. ]])

    -- 　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    -- //BU：ミナト（私服・驚き）、アキラ（部屋着・通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0945.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual Clothes, Surprised
 "Akira, you’re still up...? Who are you talking to?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0926.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Loungewear, Normal
 "A fellow non-normie. Normies should go to bed early, okay?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_03")
end
